mn15:8.7: _pītipāmojja_: success in abandoning these harmful qualities, and the sense of safety that arises from reflecting on their absence, is what gives rise to the right joy and _samādhi_ ([MN 7](https://suttas.hillsidehermitage.org/?q=mn7), [MN 39](https://suttas.hillsidehermitage.org/?q=mn39)).
